name: pnp-list-formatting-message-chat-format
title: Message Chat Format
shortDescription: This sample formats your SharePoint list view to look like a message chat. If `Author` equals `@me`, the message will be displayed on the right.
longDescription: This sample formats your SharePoint list view to look like a message chat. If `Author` equals `@me`, the message will be displayed on the right.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
